column1: The Trump Administration's proposed rule to weaken the #CRA and make it easier for banks to discriminate is just plain wrong. I am working with @FSCDems to stand up for communities of color & help rectify discrimination in housing and mortgage finance.   https://t.co/zItnFzGar9

What my colleagues and I witnessed today is a human rights crisis of major proportions. As Members of Congress we will redouble our efforts to end the #RemainInMexico policy and restore decency to our asylum process. #DemsAtTheBorder https://t.co/jbvuozd3SP

What I saw today is terrible. The Trump Admin should be ashamed of #RemainInMexico and the #TentCourts. There are about 2500 people living in squalor in what used to be a park. They are awaiting their court dates in unsafe and unsanitary conditions. #DemsAtTheBorder https://t.co/0teyxpsVJu

The conditions in the camps are heartbreaking. They get water rationed from a bucket. They see a doctor in what looks like a large portapotty. There are so many children. Before Trump’s #RemainInMexico policy these families could wait in the US for their asylum court dates. https://t.co/FNcpGlF5rM

Before we crossed the border we met with advocates from @TXCivilRights @ACLUTx @ABA_Immigration and Sister Norma from @CCharitiesUSA to talk about how we can help immigrant families. #DemsAtTheBorder https://t.co/IuRWBgoS5s

I’m about to cross the border into Matamoros to witness the encampments of migrants who are seeking asylum. I am here with a diverse group of @HouseDemocrats from all over the country who care deeply about the rights of immigrants. https://t.co/BUO8RAtVIC
This is good news but it's about damn time.  https://t.co/gfLBPC4xGg

The government’s own watchdog agency the GAO says President Trump violated the law when he withheld aid from Ukraine. We need a full and fair impeachment trial in the Senate with witnesses testimony and documents.   Anything less is a sham.   https://t.co/6yInJw5o5q

I’m joining the @HispanicCaucus on a trip to Brownsville and Matamoros to see the impacts of Trump’s #RemaininMexico policy. I will share updates of what I am seeing here and on my other social media channels. https://t.co/PrjBntdz4W

I represent thousands of Boricuas in Chicago. My wife is from #PuertoRico. This is personal for me. Our Puerto Rican brothers & sisters deserve a government that acts with the same urgency as if a hurricane or earthquake hit Trump’s mansion in Mar-a-Lago. https://t.co/SmOq4I9g4e
Marching with @NydiaVelazquez and @Pwr4PuertoRico to urge HUD to release aid to Puerto Rico without harsh restrictions. https://t.co/LXmN168jsC

Our country is experiencing a homelessness and affordable housing crisis. It's estimated that less than 1 in 3 low-income families in Chicago have access to affordable housing. I spoke at @FSCDems hearing about gentrification and displacement & what the federal government can do. https://t.co/thxFlNhxk7

Yesterday my colleagues @RepBobbyRush @RepDannyDavis and I honored our friend and mentor Richard Barnett with speeches on the House floor. His legacy will live forever.⁣ ⁣ Rest in power. ✊🏽⁣ https://t.co/YmJe1dhIBn
Thank you chairman! I’m honored to work under your leadership and join a group of tremendous environmental justice fighters. 🌎 https://t.co/cal60dqueM
Thank you my friend! Thrilled to be part of this important committee. https://t.co/bR8Vo7tLsO
Thank you! Looking forward to working together. 🌳 🌲 https://t.co/Frp9QAFTAF

Puerto Ricans shouldn’t have to wait any longer! Tell Trump and Republicans to approve the Major Disaster Declaration requested by Puerto Rico’s Governor @wandavazquezg now! Every day of delay is one more day of suffering on the island. #PuertoRicoEarthquake https://t.co/PgzZhkyZf2
Thank you amiga! #CGCStrong https://t.co/dSN17H54EM

The #2020Census will determine crucial funding for schools highways and federal programs such as Medicaid and SNAP.   Tell us in the comments why the census is important to you!⁣ https://t.co/dDRxcp1SeZ
Award season is underway in Hollywood and we keep asking #WhereAreTheLatinos? Representation matters! https://t.co/u6wPPYadoi

How do we build the #FutureofTransportation? By investing in transit and reducing emissions and car-dependence. That’s the message  I shared at today’s @NASEMTRB #TRBAM with @RepMarkTakano https://t.co/z5GvOXZU41

Nuestros hermanos y hermanos en Puerto Rico necesitan ayuda inmediata. Un sinnúmero de familias lo han perdido todo y viven con miedo esperando el siguiente terremoto.  Da click en el enlace para saber cómo apoyarlos.  ⬇️ https://t.co/q9ZupFor14

Our fellow Americans in #PuertoRico need immediate help. Countless families have lost everything and are living in fear of the next earthquake.   Follow the link to find out how you can support them during this time of need.  ⬇️ https://t.co/q9ZupFor14
Thank you for the invitation @timvsexton.  It was a great opportunity to discuss why we founded the #FutureofTransportation Caucus. https://t.co/yZLJIgyw59

I'm joining my colleague and co-chair of the #FutureofTransportationCaucus @RepMarkTakano  today @NASEMTRB to discuss how to make transportation systems more equitable and accessible. https://t.co/7rawH21wHs

ON MONDAY 1/13: I’ll be talking about our #FutureofTransportation Caucus w/ @RepMarkTakano at @theNASciences #TRBAM! We need to shift focus to promote equity access & sustainability. Thanks @NASEMTRB @SmartGrowthUSA’s Eric Sundquist @MnDOT’s Tim Sexton @VTSPIA's Ralph Hall
Mitch McConnell the articles of #impeachment are coming your way.  Do your job! https://t.co/vtC2qlTSUX

Proud to vote to limit the @realDonaldTrump’s ability to wage war with Iran. My constituents oppose another war and we share the conviction that war should always be a last resort. #NoWarWithIran https://t.co/MYB2v1c9zC

I am following the effects of #PuertoRicoEarthquake where many of my constituents have family members. The situation is urgent—homes are destroyed and people don’t have electricity. Trump should help Puerto Rico as if it were his own neighborhood. Help Boricua rebuild now! https://t.co/hF2ZiMdre4

Trump guts key environmental laws as fires floods & hurricanes threaten people everywhere. Instead of fighting #ClimateChange he’s making it cheaper & easier for companies to pollute & destroy our environment. We must reject these changes! #NEPA https://t.co/F2EApT8oVZ

The Trump Admin’s plan to deport Mexican asylum-seekers to Guatemala has been put on hold. This shortsighted plan would put thousands of lives at risk. While this is a victory for now our fight for a fair and humane immigration system is not over.  https://t.co/yEYqJfAiwv

Mis pensamientos están con nuestros conciudadanos en Puerto Rico después de estos terremotos y con las familias de mi distrito y en todo Estados Unidos que tienen familiares en la isla. ¡Puerto Rico estamos contigo! https://t.co/a3NkB9OcEo

My thoughts and solidarity are with the people of Puerto Rico in the aftermath of the earthquakes and with the families in my district and throughout the country who have relatives on the island. ¡Puerto Rico estamos contigo! https://t.co/zbVSnA8mP2

Latinos make up nearly 20% of the US population & 24% of box office sales but only 3% of the workforce in Hollywood. It’s time for the industry to take our communities seriously & improve representation & diversity. #RepresentationMatters  https://t.co/0y65HF3FS0

My heart is with our brothers and sisters in Puerto Rico who have endured a series of earthquakes & aftershocks in recent days. Our federal government must act immediately to help the affected communities stay safe & recover.    Here are some resources:   https://t.co/ArCiavRJqB

I’m talking of course about the Feast of the Epiphany or #ThreeKingsDay. For everyone who partakes in this celebration may you have a blessed day in your family’s company and enjoy a delicious rosca de reyes! #DíaDeReyes

For many families in Mexico Puerto Rico Spain and Latin America holidays are not over yet. After the posadas Christmas and New Year’s Eve there’s still one more celebratory occasion that many of my constituents get together for.
#NoWarWithIran  Pass it on. https://t.co/EqJppZi8FV

The killing of Iranian general Qasem Soleimani by our military forces confirms our worst fears: President Trump may be provoking an international crisis and putting us on the brink of war to distract the country from his impeachment. This is wrong.   My full statement is below. https://t.co/gENIoDD3CC
New Year Resolution: to make sure everyone is counted in the #2020Census.  #MakeIllinoisCount #HagaseContar https://t.co/bXoiH0NOcv

To close 2019 here are some key legislative wins my team and I worked on. It has been my honor to serve Illinois' 4th Congressional District and I look forward to another year fighting for you. Have a safe and happy #NewYear2020! https://t.co/nM7nBFsNKy

From holding big banks accountable to restoring due process for immigrants this year I introduced ten bills. One of them the #COAlertsAct which provides funds for carbon monoxide detectors in public housing passed the House and has bipartisan support in the Senate. https://t.co/0QqKp4b4vy

As this year comes to a close I wanted to give you an update of all that we have accomplished. Since January we have responded to more than 20000 letters from constituents and we've had 180 listening sessions roundtables constituent meetings and district site visits. https://t.co/J8uP5W1KmE
My colleague the conscience of Congress @repjohnlewis is a fighter.  I know he will give his all—as he has always done— to fight this cancer. My prayers are with him and his family.
The #RemainInMexico policies have just exacerbated the humanitarian crisis at the border. We must make .@realDonaldTrump  accountable. https://t.co/lf7kxAfBeo
Happy #Kwanzaa to my friends who celebrate!⁣ https://t.co/NxdrMEF6VX

On Christmas Day the Pope called again for kindness towards migrants. May his message continue to inspire our work against the Trump Administration's inhumane treatment of those fleeing violence and persecution. #DontLookAway #FamiliesBelongTogether https://t.co/GOo7yA5KKq

Our family is getting into the holiday spirit today. We are making pork chicken and rajas con queso #tamales. First we made the meat then the masa and finally we rolled them up. Evelyn was the perfect assistant too! 😜 Happy Christmas Eve! https://t.co/42VBBIqlJP

Mientras celebramos Navidad y la época de decembrina Evelyn y yo disfrutamos del tiempo con nuestros hijos y nietos. Y al dar gracias con nuestras familias recordemos a aquellos que también merecen la oportunidad de una mejor vida. ¡Feliz Navidad! https://t.co/PLjI2xWqLv

As we celebrate Christmas and the Holidays we enjoy  time with our children and grandchildren. While we give thanks with our families let’s  reach out to our neighbors and refugees throughout the world who deserve the chance for a better opportunity. ¡Feliz Navidad! https://t.co/HJTLHxaymK

I called for Mr. Muilenburg’s resignation when he testified before the @TransportDems in October. Mr. Muilenburg padded his personal finances by fostering a corporate culture that put profits over safety. His resignation is long overdue. https://t.co/9DFbAPErAf
Reminder: Here are our office hours for the end of the year. From our office to your family Happy Holidays! 🎄🎁 https://t.co/stcNMGfQlB
Happy #Hanukkah to those who celebrate the Festival of Lights. May you enjoy this time with family and loved ones. Chag Sameach! https://t.co/ig9JNPxn2a

¡Adelante Alejandra you’re an inspiration! People like you are the reason we need to pass the #NewWayForward Act to disrupt the prison to deportation pipeline and keep families together. https://t.co/9KpRy2R5m7

Ultimately I could not vote for USMCA because the trade agreement lacks climate standards and fails to secure labor protections for working people in my district throughout the U.S. and Mexico.  Read my full statement below:  https://t.co/ODVF8H4Gt3

I voted to impeach President Trump to do right by my constituents the future of our democracy and to uphold the rule of law and my oath to defend the Constitution.   No one is above the law not even the President. https://t.co/T5TTitgkc8
Lower healthcare costs higher wages climate change action...More than 275 Bipartisan bills are sitting on @senatemajldr’s desk. We demand action #ForThePeople. https://t.co/FSQrFCZ5Uz

As an immigrant and as a Member of Congress I have a responsibility to my constituents to continue creating opportunities to improve their lives but also to defend them against Trump’s cruel and racist policies. #BorderWall @HispanicCaucus https://t.co/0ZCB86Xggj

This horrific report shows us the negligence and the severe lack of medical attention ICE provides immigrants held in its custody. We must shed light on and end the cruelty of Trump’s immigration policies. #DontLookAway https://t.co/FQjRHFEKVf

JUST IN: The enrollment period for #ACA has been extended to December 18th due to the crash of the marketplace website on Sunday.   Visit https://t.co/c9JSXzLjkM to enroll NOW! #GetCovered  https://t.co/43HrrScZv6

@SenWarren @federalreserve @FDICgov The creation of a new bank with almost $450 billion worth of assets has broad implications for working families their communities and U.S. financial system and consumers deserve to know exactly how these decisions are made by your agency. @FDICgov @federalreserve

Sent a letter with @SenWarren to the @federalreserve & @FDICgov with questions about their agencies' rubber-stamp approval of the $450 billion #BBTSuntrust merger. The merger created the first new big "Too Big To Fail" bank since the financial crisis. https://t.co/nPYj6QOPlX
Open Enrollment ends this Sunday – December 15th. Don’t miss your chance to #GetCovered for 2020. Sign up at: https://t.co/gEWzh0U7J6 https://t.co/55vIhUptaj

The American people have heard the facts. Trump engaged in bribery to pressure Ukraine to investigate a political rival in the 2020 election. He put his political and personal gain ahead of the integrity of our democracy. Today @HouseJudiciary approved the impeachment charges. https://t.co/xItFZ3NzTQ

Too many families are forced to choose between putting food on the table or paying for life-saving prescription drugs. I voted to pass H.R. 3 to help people like my constituent 3-year old Elizabeth who lives with cystic fibrosis have access to the medications they need. https://t.co/yF58purO6r

Now hearing about the proposed  FDIC/OCC changes to the Community Reinvestment Act (CRA). Any rule that takes a “one size fits all” approach to #CRA will undermine investment in low-and-moderate income communities and allow banks to disregard local neighborhood needs. https://t.co/oPEKf4oYMo
I’m here at the @FDICgov board meeting with @RepMaxineWaters @RepBillFoster @BradSherman & @RepCindyAxne to conduct oversight over Trump’s financial regulators. #ForThePeople https://t.co/UkpU3qwctT

Not a single senior member of Trump’s White House went to the #COP25 conference. Meanwhile @SpeakerPelosi led a 15 member delegation to show the world #WeAreStillIn the  #ParisAgreement and will #ActonClimate—no matter what Trump does or says.   https://t.co/ImSulkfUOg

As the son of a Bracero I support the #FarmWorkforceModernizationAct. This bill is for the over 1 million undocumented farm workers who endure tough conditions to put food on our tables. It will help keep families together and ensure a path to legal status. #SiSePuede https://t.co/Xj6S4uvXQm

Mom: factory worker  Dad: Bracero farm worker cold storage worker  My job: community activist and Member of Congress  I loved reading the stories on this thread that honor our families and their hard work. I'm grateful for my parents' sacrifices so I could be where I am today. https://t.co/TCoEmo3vpL

🚨 Breaking 🚨  A second federal judge has blocked Trump from diverting military funds including Puerto Rico disaster relief aid to build his racist and useless border wall. This is a big win!  https://t.co/hkhTyg4TVt

Presenté el proyecto de ley #UnNuevoCaminoHaciaAdelante para ayudar a inmigrantes como Alejandra Cano una madre de Chicago que cambió su vida. Nuestro sistema de inmigración no da segundas oportunidades. Eso tiene que cambiar. No más criminalización para los inmigrantes! https://t.co/X0lAgZj3w9

I introduced the #NewWayFoward Act to help people like Alejandra Cano a mom from Chicago who turned her life around. Currently our immigration system leaves no room for second chances. That must change. Our communities deserve restoration & repair not further criminalization. https://t.co/6t1UIVNAcw

Members of Congress take an oath to defend the Constitution. It's our duty to protect our democracy—a job I take very seriously. President Trump violated the Constitution and no matter how he tries to spin it he must be held accountable. No one is above the law. https://t.co/YvNaUfgc2g

Proud to introduce the #NewWayForward Act w/@RepPressley @RepJudyChu @RepRaulGrijalva @RepSylviaGarcia @RepJayapal & @RepKarenBass to disrupt the prison to deportation pipeline give immigrants the dignity of due process & ensure America remains a nation that welcomes all. https://t.co/zP5yWYdX5r

Join me @RepPressley @RepEspaillat @RepJudyChu @RepRaulGrijalva @RepSylviaGarcia & advocacy organizations as we introduce A New Way Forward Act which takes an important step toward remedying injustices in the U.S. immigration system. https://t.co/UD2I0Jhh0f

Proud to introduce the DIVERSIFY Act with @RepJahanaHayes & @SenBooker which will increase the TEACH Grant award to support students interested in becoming teachers ensuring an education workforce as diverse as the students it serves.  https://t.co/JiBqlXyVDY

It’s been six years since the Supreme Court gutted the Voting Rights Act. @HouseDemocrats just passed #HR4 the Voting Rights Advancement Act to ensure every American’s voice is heard at the ballot box. #RestoreTheVote #ForThePeople https://t.co/bmVAA1YNRi

This video is very hard to watch but #DontLookAway. @CBP lied about the circumstances of Carlos Vasquez’s death and failed to provide him with medical care. This negligence is costing lives. We should all be horrified. #JusticeForCarlos #KeepFamiliesTogether https://t.co/TBJCoDWQSL

Great to see @staceyabrams and talk with her about the importance of the #2020Census and ways we can organize to ensure our communities are fully and accurately counted. #HazteContar https://t.co/T3xxrQirBA
Good to see Chicago’s @ErinAlemanCMAP testifying on behalf of @ONTO2050 at today’s @TransportDems hearing on environmentally sustainable freight investment and planning. https://t.co/ljXeqaD46k

The holidays are here but #WallStreet has been receiving gifts all year long with harmful deregulatory proposals issued by Mnuchin’s @USTreasury. @FSCDems are examining the Trump Admin’s actions that threaten our nation's financial security.  Tune in ➡️ https://t.co/RlMvprStS8

.@ICEgov paid @McKinsey more than $20 million to find ways to reduce costs at detention centers.  McKinsey advised them to cut spending on food and medical services for migrants.   They profited on human suffering. #ShameOnMcKinsey  https://t.co/ArADG1LYq5

Trump's SNAP rule hurts people in need during a time when too many are forced to stretch already-thin budgets to make ends meet. The truth is many SNAP recipients are either attempting to find work or face hardships that prevent them from doing so. #HandsOffSNAP https://t.co/zTNsjOJOnn

Because of Trump’s #FamilySeparation policy:  ❌ Thousands of families have been torn apart ❌ Parents have been deported without their children ❌ The Admin has yet to reunify all separated families  #DontLookAway - watch the panel on #USCCRReports ⬇️  https://t.co/DyRMf3AjX4

When big banks get bigger consumers and taxpayers usually lose. That’s why today I’m introducing a bill with @SenWarren to protect consumers and taxpayers by reforming the “rubber stamp” bank merger review process.   https://t.co/qaqjkCu7Tc

The #Impeachment inquiry found significant evidence that Trump abused the power of the presidency for his own political and personal gain at the expense of our national security. No one is above the law. Not even the President. https://t.co/c7CLUE6KVE
The House has passed nearly 400 bills many of which are bipartisan. @HouseDemocrats are working #ForThePeople.   @senatemajldr is blocking them.    https://t.co/eHEzxdBiiV

Evelyn y yo disfrutamos tener el programa @AlPunto en nuestra comunidad y mostrar lugares como la biblioteca Rudy Lozano la Calle 26 y el jardín comunitario que ayudamos a poner en pie. También hablé sobre mi llegada a EUA y mi compromiso social. 👇 https://t.co/SrCPDOwblx

Evelyn & I enjoyed showing Univision’s @AlPunto our community including the Rudy Lozano Library  26th St & the neighborhood garden we helped organize. I shared the story of my arrival in the US my family & my deep commitment to help my community. 👇 https://t.co/SrCPDOwblx
@RepMcGovern My heartfelt condolences to you and your family @RepMcGovern.
Today and every day I am thankful for the opportunity to represent the people of #IL04.   #HappyThanksgiving from my family to yours! 🦃🍁 https://t.co/8nPespiw63

Proud to join @RepDMP and other @HouseDemocrats urging @senatemajldr to pass the #PaycheckFairnessAct. Latinas across the country shouldn't have to work an extra 11 months to earn the same wages as their white male counterparts. #EqualPay https://t.co/kghl13ECgF

As a cosponsor of End the Migrant Protection Protocols Act a bill which would end this program I know it has nothing to do with protections and is instead a clear violation of asylum seeker’s rights. https://t.co/em3wNRqzJy

Today I welcomed leaders of @PASOACTION to my district office. They recently traveled to the Southern border to help assist migrants caught in the humanitarian crisis created by the Migrant Protection Protocols or ‘Remain in Mexico Policy.’ https://t.co/SBc3sRh5Mz

The holiday season is a time to bond and come together around meals. Unfortunately @realDonaldTrump wants to cut 3 MILLION people from food stamps including children seniors veterans persons with disabilities and working families. This is unacceptable. #1MillionKids https://t.co/tuEPBSyYQ7
@BrendaReyesN @USbreastfeeding Thanks for sharing your thoughts on this important issue @BrendaReyesN. I am a co-sponsor of the MOMMA's Act. H.E. 1897. https://t.co/6tiolopzTi

Thank you to my colleagues @RepYvetteClarke  @RepBarbaraLee & @RepKarenBass for visiting the border to highlight the inhumane conditions in which migrants of all origins are being held due to the #RemainInMexico policy. We must stand together to fight xenophobia and racism. https://t.co/zOLb5CiBC0

Every witness we heard from in the #ImpeachmentHearings told the same story: Trump directed a pressure campaign against an ally to interfere in our elections for his own personal benefit. #DefendOurDemocracy #ForThePeople https://t.co/tsMTvhX7V1

Too often airlines blindside travelers with extremely high charges for basic services like increased baggage fees or sky-high cancellation fees. I introduced the FAIR Fees Act w/@RepCohen & @SenMarkey to protect consumers from corporate price gouging.  https://t.co/xa5NOjw6Dc

The #2020Census is coming and it's crucial for our communities to be accurately counted! Join me this Saturday at St. Paul Church where local elected officials organizations and I will be providing important information about how to #MakeIllinoisCount. #HágaseContar https://t.co/VTZ9zDUam3

Proud to lead a discussion with @USProgressives colleagues to advocate for the rights of workers to organize and join a union. When the right to organize is strengthened all working people benefit. Watch on @cspan in a few minutes. @WeBuildProgress @AFLCIO @ILAFLCIO #EdLaborCmte

Amb. Sondland: "Was there a 'quid pro quo?'   "With regard to the requested White House call and White House meeting the answer is yes.”#DefendOurDemocracy https://t.co/xHutDRx5ZZ
